document_data.name: Wavetamer
document_data.mainbody: '''Wavetamers''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Valkur]], the Captain of the Waves.
document_data.Culture: Wavetamers spread Valkur's worship across the waters of [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Abilities:
A wavetamer could [[turn undead]] specific to the sea such as [[lacedon]]s and [[sea zombie]]s. They enjoyed a blessing from [[Selûne]], that represented her friendly relationship with Valkur, that made it easier for them to navigate via the stars. They possessed extensive knowledge regarding sailing vessels of all shapes and sizes, making them adept at navigating treacherous waters in any craft and performing repairs.

Wavetamers possessed a number of magical abilities. Once per tenday they could conjure fruit for a crew of up to 100 sailors to ward off [[scurvy]]. They could cast the following [[spell]]s once per day: ''[[weathertell]]'', ''[[swim]]'', ''[[control winds]]'', ''[[ride the wind]]'', and ''[[control weather]]''. The following spells could be cast twice per day: ''[[trip]]'', ''[[warp wood]]'', ''[[straighten wood]]'', and ''[[slow rot]]''. They could also cast ''[[weather summoning]]'' three times per tenday and ''[[conjure air elemental]]'' or ''[[conjure water elemental]]'' once per tenday.
document_data.Possessions: In addition to blunt weapons, wavetamers commonly wielded [[cutlass]]es, [[harpoon]]s, [[net]]s, and [[trident]]s. They heavist [[armor]] they wore was [[chainmail]] and they never used a [[shield]].
